statements: SELECT * FROM enrollments WHERE enrollment_id = 1;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollments WHERE course_id = 101;
SELECT enrollment_id, learning_progress FROM enrollments WHERE learning_progress > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM enrollments WHERE student_id = 202 ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollments WHERE course_id IN (101, 102) ORDER BY student_id ASC, enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM enrollments WHERE student_id = 1 AND course_id = 101;
SELECT enrollment_id, student_id, course_id FROM enrollments WHERE learning_progress > 0.5 ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;
SELECT student_id, AVG(learning_progress) AS avg_progress FROM enrollments GROUP BY student_id HAVING AVG(learning_progress) > 0.7;
SELECT enrollment_id, student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollments WHERE enrollment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31' ORDER BY enrollment_date ASC;
SELECT student_id, COUNT(DISTINCT course_id) AS num_courses FROM enrollments GROUP BY student_id ORDER BY num_courses DESC;
SELECT * FROM online_courses;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM online_courses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT class_name, class_description FROM in_person_classes;
SELECT class_name, start_date, end_date FROM in_person_classes WHERE end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT course_name, course_description FROM online_courses WHERE course_id = 5;
SELECT course_id, course_name, start_date, end_date FROM online_courses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM online_courses WHERE course_name LIKE '%Python%' AND end_date >= '2022-06-01';
SELECT class_name, class_description FROM in_person_classes WHERE end_date <= '2023-01-01';
SELECT course_id, course_name, start_date FROM online_courses WHERE course_description IS NOT NULL ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM in_person_classes WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-07-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM online_courses;
SELECT course_name, course_duration FROM online_courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM in_person_classes ORDER BY class_capacity DESC;
SELECT class_name, location, class_schedule FROM in_person_classes WHERE class_id = 3;

SELECT student_name, course_name, class_name FROM student_enrollment JOIN online_courses ON student_enrollment.course_id = online_courses.course_id JOIN in_person_classes ON student_enrollment.class_id = in_person_classes.class_id;
SELECT * FROM online_courses WHERE course_id = 1;
SELECT class_name, location, class_schedule FROM in_person_classes WHERE class_capacity > 20 ORDER BY class_capacity DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name, enrollment_date FROM student_enrollment INNER JOIN online_courses ON student_enrollment.course_id = online_courses.course_id ORDER BY enrollment_date ASC;
SELECT instructor_name, course_duration FROM online_courses WHERE course_name LIKE '%Programming%' AND course_duration > 10;
SELECT * FROM in_person_classes WHERE location = 'New York' AND class_schedule = 'Monday-Friday';
SELECT * FROM online_courses;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM online_courses WHERE start_date='2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM in_person_classes ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM in_person_classes;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE enrollment_date>'2021-12-01' AND status='active';
SELECT * FROM online_courses;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM online_courses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, email, enrollment_date FROM students JOIN enrollment ON students.student_id = enrollment.student_id WHERE enrollment_status = 'enrolled';
SELECT class_name, instructor, location FROM in_person_classes ORDER BY instructor, location;
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM online_courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM online_courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, enrollment_limit FROM online_courses WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01' AND end_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE enrollment_status = 'enrolled';
SELECT class_name, location FROM in_person_classes WHERE capacity > 20 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
SELECT course_name, instructor, start_date, end_date FROM online_courses WHERE enrollment_limit > 10;
SELECT * FROM online_courses WHERE enrollment_limit > 50;
SELECT student_name, email FROM students WHERE enrollment_status = 'enrolled';
SELECT course_name, start_date, end_date FROM online_courses ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT student_name, course_name, progress FROM students s JOIN enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id WHERE progress > 0.5 ORDER BY progress DESC;
SELECT class_name, location, start_date, end_date FROM in_person_classes WHERE capacity > 30 ORDER BY start_date ASC;
